divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: Driving down from Idyllwild on Hwy 74 at approx 6:10 PM observed a triangular object falling east of Hwy 74, south of Lake Hemet and north of the fire station. Object was a bright neon green, outlined in yellow, large bright fire extending from the end...It fell into Garner Valley...I did not observe any fire or smoke....My 8 year old son in the back seat also saw the object.....
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mountain Center
This sighting has never been favorited.
